Package: unacloud

[Groovy] Class UserRestrictionService

    • unacloud.UserRestrictionService

    • This service contains all methods to manage User restriction: these methods returns values like allocator, repository and labs defined to be used for user. This class connects with database using hibernate

      Authors:
      CesarF

          Representation of Hardware profiles services

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          UserRestrictionService ()

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.Object getAllocator(User user)
          Returns the configured allocator in restrictions for user, in case there is not configured an allocator restriction for user it takes default allocator in server variable
          java.lang.Object getAvoidHwdProfiles(User user)
          Returns the list of valid Hardware Profiles that can be used by user
          java.lang.Object getAvoidLabs(User user)
          Returns the list of valid Laboratories to deploy virtual executions
          java.lang.Object getRepository(User user)
          Returns the configured repository in restrictions for user, in case

      • Method Detail

        • java.lang.Object getAllocator(User user)

          Returns the configured allocator in restrictions for user, in case there is not configured an allocator restriction for user it takes default allocator in server variable

          Parameters:
          user - to request allocator
          Returns:
          defined allocator in user, default allocator in case user doesn't have allocator defined

        • java.lang.Object getAvoidHwdProfiles(User user)

          Returns the list of valid Hardware Profiles that can be used by user

          Parameters:
          user - to request hardware profiles
          Returns:
          list of available hardware profile for user

        • java.lang.Object getAvoidLabs(User user)

          Returns the list of valid Laboratories to deploy virtual executions

          Parameters:
          user - to request available labs
          Returns:
          list of available labs for user

        • java.lang.Object getRepository(User user)

          Returns the configured repository in restrictions for user, in case

          Parameters:
          user - to request repository
          Returns:
          repository for user, returns default in case user doesn't have repository defined
